He said: The Met has today received significant new information relating to allegations of phone hacking at the News of the World in 2005/06. As a result, the Met is launching a new investigation to consider this material.`` This work will be carried out by the specialist crime directorate which has been investigating a related phone hacking allegation since September 2010. Last week, former News of the World editor Andy Coulson resigned as David Cameron 's communications chief, though he has continually denied any knowledge of hacking during his time at the paper.
